entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING ENDED, Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Bagotville 3:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: WNW 24 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
